data.title: Surface Water Well
data.summary: Provide easy access to clean water for the vilage, supports 200-400 individuals. These wells sustain livelihoods, ensuring a continuous flow of clean water for those in need.

featuredImage.alt: Villagers celebrating the completion of the well, a life-changing moment for the community

data.title: Artisanal Water Well
data.summary: Provide easy access to clean water for the vilage, supports 400-600 individuals. Crafting lifelines from the earth, artisanal wells bring sustenance to parched lands.

featuredImage.alt: Wells in Africa: Villagers gathering water from a new well in a rural village

data.title: Solar Water Well
data.summary: Provide easy access to clean water for the vilage, supports 800+ individuals. Harnessing sunlight to quench thirst, illuminating lives with sustainable water solutions.

featuredImage.alt: Learn About our project Sadaqah Wells - Africa Relief

data.title: Emergency Earthquake Relief Needed
data.summary: The vulnerable communities in Morocco faced severe impacts from the 6.8-magnitude earthquake. Tragically, over 2,000 lives were lost, with thousands more injured. Many awaiting rescue.

featuredImage.alt: Africa Relief: Morocco Earthquake Relief Fund Aid

data.title: Libya Floods
data.summary: The Floods have devastated the city of Derna, killing thousands and leaving at least 10,000 missing. The local community needs your urgent support.

featuredImage.alt: Families affected by the floods in Libya receiving much-needed aid and assistance

data.title: Ghana Floods
data.summary: Southeastern Ghana faces escalating displacements post Akosombo Dam water release on Oct 13. Your support matters.

featuredImage.alt: Donate to ghana: Streets submerged in floodwaters, illustrating the extent of flooding in Ghana.

data.title: Educational Center
data.summary: In Africa, where knowledge is power, 20% lack formal schooling, while 28% completed primary, 37% secondary, and 15% higher education, these statistics highligh the importance of accessible learning opportunities

featuredImage.alt: Image of a classroom project funded through DonorsChoose, illustrating direct support to public school teachers

data.title: Students Sponsorship
data.summary: In Africa, the journey to education is marred by staggering statistics. Over 20% of children aged 6 to 11 miss the chance to enter the classroom, a figure that balloons to one-third for youths aged 12 to 14. Shockingly, almost 60% of youths between 15 and 17 are deprived of the school experience.

featuredImage.alt: A sponsored child studying diligently, empowered by African education sponsorship.

data.title: Food Basket
data.summary: Let’s Unite to Ensure No Neighbor Goes Hungry. In Africa, Two-Thirds Struggle with Food Insecurity. Your Donation Fights Hunger. Join Us to Create a Lasting Impact!

featuredImage.alt: Individuals contributing to the initiative of providing food baskets to alleviate hunger in their community

data.title: Hearing Aid Device
data.summary: A world of sound, a world of possibilities—gifted by the power of hearing

featuredImage.alt: A person receiving a hearing aid, a life-changing moment thanks to generous donations.

data.title: Health Care
data.summary: Your donation isn’t just a contribution; it’s a lifeline that fortifies communities and bolsters healthcare systems. Let’s transform hope into action, ensuring every individual in Africa receives the quality healthcare they rightfully deserve.

featuredImage.alt: "Investment in healthcare infrastructure development to improve access to quality healthcare in Africa.

data.title: Cataract Surgery
data.summary: Every restored sight means a regained life. Join us in bringing the gift of vision to those in need, illuminating their world, and empowering them with the possibilities they need.

featuredImage.alt: Surgeon performing cataract surgery in a well-equipped operating room, showcasing advanced techniques in eye care

data.title: Orphans Sponsorship
data.summary: In the past, hearts were filled with care for orphans, embracing them with love. Today, their numbers have grown, and many who could have aided them are gone. Orphanhood, once uncommon, now prevails. The few remaining struggle to provide, unable to meet the rising tide of need.

featuredImage.alt: Learn about orphan sponsorship project at Africa Relief

data.title: Zakat Al-Mal
data.summary: Zakat Al-Mal embodies the spirit of generosity, providing essential aid to uplift lives and communities

featuredImage.alt: A generous individual giving money to a charity as part of their Zakat donation

data.title: Zakat Al-Fitr
data.summary: Zakat Al-Fitr, embodies the spirit of generosity and solidarity within Islam. It’s a mandatory charitable donation given at the conclusion of Ramadan, symbolizing purification and support for the less fortunate.

featuredImage.alt: Individuals contributing to charitable causes as an essential part of their Eid al-Fitr celebrations

data.title: Iftar Meal
data.summary: It’s more than just a meal, Having the Iftar meal together fosters unity and kindness, creating bonds that transcend hunger.

featuredImage.alt: A community gathering for a Ramadan Iftar, where donated meals are shared among attendees
